tool_description:
The Tomorrow.io Weather API delivers fast, reliable, and hyper-accurate weather data with the flexibility to integrate with any application, system, or program.
See why 40k developers currently use Tomorrow.io Weather API. Try it for free today here.
title: Tomorrow.io

api_list.name: Weather Forecast
api_list.description: Get Weather forecast for Core parameters

api_list.name: retrieveTimelinesBasic

required_parameters.name: startTime
required_parameters.description: Start time in ISO 8601 format \"2019-03-20T14:09:50Z\" (defaults to now)

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: (Required) ID of a pre-defined location or latlong string

required_parameters.name: fields
required_parameters.description: (Required) Selected fields from our data layers (polygon/polyline default to Max, if not suffix is not specified)

optional_parameters.name: timezone
optional_parameters.description: Timezone of time values, according to IANA Timezone Names (defaults to UTC)

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: Units of field values, either \"metric\" or \"imperial\" (defaults to metric)

api_list.name: retrieveWeatherRecentHisotry
api_list.description: Get recent historical weather of a location

api_list.name: retrieveRealtimeWeather
api_list.description: Get the Realtime Weather for a location

api_list.name: retrieveEventsBasic

optional_parameters.name: insights
optional_parameters.description: (Required) Pre-defined category names or custom insight IDs

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: (Required) ID of a pre-defined location or latlong string

optional_parameters.name: buffer
optional_parameters.description: The buffer around locations, in case of pre-defined insight categories (in km)

api_list.name: updateALocation
removeLocationTags
createALocation
retrieveALocation
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tomorrow-io1.p.rapidapi.com/v4/locations/{locationid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tomorrow-io1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: unlinkLocations
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tomorrow-io1.p.rapidapi.com/v4/alerts/{{alertId}}/locations/unlink"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tomorrow-io1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
